documentCapture.INSTRUCTIONS_0: Including documents helps your local Public Health Unit confirm the immunization records you have provided.
documentCapture.INSTRUCTIONS_1: A document from your doctor displaying immunizations only. This can be a photo of the document.
documentCapture.INSTRUCTIONS_2: Any document that does not relate to immunization information.
documentCapture.YELLOWCARD_PHOTO: A photo of a Yellow Card
documentCapture.UPLOAD_NOTES: These documents will only be used by your local Public Health Unit to confirm the immunization records you have provided. These files will not be added to the Provincial Immunization Repository.
documentCapture.FILE_TYPES: The uploaded files must each be less than 5MB in size, and of the following file types: .doc, .docx, .jpeg, .jpg, .pdf, .png
documentCapture.UPLOADER_ERROR: There was and error uploading the document.
documentCapture.UPLOADER_ERROR_QUEUE_LIMIT: You have exceeded the upload limit of 2 files. Please remove some files and retry.
documentCapture.UPLOADER_ERROR_FILE_TYPE: You have selected an invalid file type.
documentCapture.UPLOADER_ERROR_FILE_SIZE: You have attempted to upload a file that is too big. Maximum file size is 5MB
documentCapture.UPLOADER_ERROR_FILE_DUPLICATE: You can't add the same file twice.

sessionExpiry.NOTE: Cancelling will discard all your data.

welcomeLogin.AUTH_LABEL: An Ontario Immunization ID and PIN let you do more, faster!
welcomeLogin.AUTH_MESSAGE: <button class='icon-btn-link' id='home-oiid-link-one' ng-click='$ctrl.openHelpModal()'>Learn more </button> about what the Ontario Immunization ID and PIN are and where they can be found.
welcomeLogin.ANON_LABEL: Don't have an Ontario Immunization ID and PIN?
welcomeLogin.ANON_MESSAGE_1: You can submit immunizations without an
welcomeLogin.ANON_MESSAGE_2: but you will be required to enter additional information along with the dates and names of vaccines given.

welcomeHelpModal.OIID_PIN_LABEL: What are the Ontario Immunization ID and PIN?
welcomeHelpModal.LOGIN_OIID: An Ontario Immunization ID is a ten digit number that uniquely identifies each person in the provincial immunization registry.
welcomeHelpModal.LOGIN_PIN: A patient's PIN is a six digit number that protects the confidentiality of immunization information.
welcomeHelpModal.OIID_TOOLTIP_1: A patient's Ontario Immunization ID may be found on a letter sent from
welcomeHelpModal.OIID_TOOLTIP_2: . If you do not have this code please contact
welcomeHelpModal.PIN_TOOLTIP_1: The PIN can be retrieved by contacting

welcomeLandingPage.PHU_MESSAGE: Use this site to view and update your immunizations.
welcomeLandingPage.INTRO_UL: You can use this online tool to:
welcomeLandingPage.INTRO_LI_1: Look up a personal immunization record (sometimes called a Yellow Card).
welcomeLandingPage.INTRO_LI_2: Submit immunization records to your local Public Health Unit. (the information you submit through this website will be reviewed by your local Public Health Unit.)
welcomeLandingPage.INTRO_IMMS_LAW1: If your child is under 18 and attends daycare or school in Ontario you are required to inform your Public Health Unit every time your child gets a vaccine.
welcomeLandingPage.INTRO_IMMS_LAW2: Children's immunization records are reviewed to assess requirements for attending school as outlined in the
welcomeLandingPage.INTRO_BULLET_2: Child Care and Early Years Act, 2014 (CCEYA).
welcomeLandingPage.INTRO_3: Immunization information may also be required for medical treatment and other children’s programs.
welcomeLandingPage.INTRO_4: Adults can also use this tool to keep track of personal immunizations and make sure immunization are up to date.
welcomeLandingPage.INTRO_ALT: Alternatively, you can contact your Public Health Unit directly to submit immunization information or request your immunization record.

welcomeSubmitterModal.IMMUNIZATION_SUBMISSION_LABEL: Who are you submitting immunizations for?
welcomeSubmitterModal.IMMUNIZATION_RETRIEVAL_LABEL: Who are you entering an Ontario Immunization ID and PIN for?

yellowCardRecommendations.HEADING: Immunizations Needed
yellowCardRecommendations.INTRO: As recommended by the Ontario Immunization Schedule you need immunizations to be protected against the following diseases:
yellowCardRecommendations.NOTE: Note: Immunizations needed may change if additional immunization information is submitted.
yellowCardRecommendations.FOR_MORE_INFO: For more information please visit Ontario’s Health Immunization page.
yellowCardRecommendations.PRINT_BUTTON: Printable PDF Version of Immunization Record
